trans-unit.source: Contains event data for the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"></xref> event and the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Contiene dati dell'evento per il <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown"> </xref> evento e <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> instance is shut down or unloaded, an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> event or an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> event is raised, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.AppDomain>istanza venga arrestata o scaricata, un <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown>evento o un <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded>viene generato l'evento, rispettivamente.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainUnloaded> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManager.AppDomainShutdown> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs object stores the reason for the shutdown or unload and is passed to the event handler as one of its parameters.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs archivia il motivo dell'arresto o scaricare e viene passato al gestore dell'evento come uno dei relativi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs> with the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> property set to `reason`.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore crea una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>con il <xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A>proprietà impostata su `reason`.</xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Web.Compilation.BuildManagerHostUnloadEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The reason for the hosted application domain shutdown.
trans-unit.target: Il motivo dell'arresto del dominio applicazione ospitata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the hosted application domain was shut down.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il motivo per che il dominio dell'applicazione host è stato arrestato.

trans-unit.source: The Reason property stores an <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason> object as its value that describes why the <xref:System.AppDomain> instance was shut down.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà motivo archivia un <xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>oggetto come valore che descrive il motivo di <xref:System.AppDomain>l'istanza è stata arrestata.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Web.ApplicationShutdownReason>
